overview:
## Discussion

The capture delegate receives callbacks when the photo output’s captureReadiness changes. It calls its delegate on the main queue, which allows you to perform user interface updates directly from the delegate’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinatorDelegate/readinessCoordinator(_:captureReadinessDidChange:)] method.

The coordinator provides an initial value to the delegate when you first set it on this object.

# delegate

**Instance Property**

The coordinator’s delegate object.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinatorDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The capture delegate receives callbacks when the photo output’s captureReadiness changes. It calls its delegate on the main queue, which allows you to perform user interface updates directly from the delegate’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoOutputReadinessCoordinatorDelegate/readinessCoordinator(_:captureReadinessDidChange:)] method.

The coordinator provides an initial value to the delegate when you first set it on this object.
title: delegate
